title:

descriptions:
Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - the perfect companion for your nonstick cookware! This set is designed to make your cooking experience easier and more enjoyable. 

Made from food-grade silicone with a stainless steel core, these utensils are BPA-free and heat-resistant up to 446°F. Say goodbye to melted utensils and hello to worry-free cooking. The wooden handles provide a comfortable grip and prevent heat transfer, ensuring your safety while cooking.

With its one-piece design and no-gap molding, these utensils are easy to clean and maintain. Simply hand wash them with ease - they are not dishwasher safe. Plus, the non-reactive nature of the silicone material ensures that your food remains free from any unwanted flavors.

This set includes 14 essential kitchen gadgets, including a Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Basting Brush, Whisk, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, Small Silicone Spatula, and an Utensil Holder to keep your kitchen organized.

We pride ourselves on our excellent customer service, with an after-sales response time of within 12 hours. Rest assured that any concerns or questions you have will be addressed promptly.
